tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SensorData (
  sensor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
  sensor_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE robot_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,
  sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  reading FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE robot_status (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  robot_id INT,
  status VARCHAR(50),
  battery_level FLOAT,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE robot_data (
  robot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
  sensor_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE robot_status (
  robot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  status VARCHAR(50),
  battery_level FLOAT,
  last_update TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE robot_location (
  robot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  latitude FLOAT,
  longitude FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE robot_errors (
  error_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  robot_id INT,
  error_message VARCHAR(100),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Sensors (
 sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 timestamp TIMESTAMP,
 temperature FLOAT,
 humidity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Accelerometer (
 accel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 timestamp TIMESTAMP,
 x_axis FLOAT,
 y_axis FLOAT,
 z_axis FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Gyroscope (
 gyro_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 timestamp TIMESTAMP,
 pitch FLOAT,
 roll FLOAT,
 yaw FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE GPS (
 gps_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 timestamp TIMESTAMP,
 latitude FLOAT,
 longitude FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Battery (
 battery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 timestamp TIMESTAMP,
 voltage FLOAT,
 current FLOAT
)
